channel.title: Small tiny micro gaint big server status problem
channel.description:
umm hi :D i have bought a vps and its realy awsome my server is now 24/7 and evrything on it but i still have a problem with moparscape server status when i registered my server it said 100% an hour later itwent to 40% then another half our it went 60% and i keeps going around in the 60
i think this is realy realy stange because it shud be 24/7? can you guys please help to figure out whats the problem ? i use a server restarter that restarts evry 30 minutes and a rubikscape base (not 508)
thanks for the help
*-pro banana-*
